short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Units Converter is a general-use units conversion calculator good for converting from one set of units to another.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple Units Converter (Lite) is a general-use units conversion calculator good for anyone interested in converting from one set of units to another. It was developed with ease of use as a primary objective.

Has 441 different units and 22 different dimensions: acceleration (22 different units), angle (17), area (24), cooking (28), data storage (16), density (16), energy (40), flow (volume) (22), force (16), frequency (8), illuminance (5), length / distance (30), luminance (8), luminous intensity (4), magnetic flux (2), pressure (28), speed / velocity (14), temperature (7), time (20), volume (71), volume - dry (7), weight / mass (36)
